name: Food to DIE for
description:
This is a 2 player co-op game, but it works well with one player too! Pull up a friend if you can and try to get as many points as possible!

Features:

  • Controller capable!
  • 2-player local co-op, or one player!
  • Make sure to turn on music and sfx, as well as checking your controls in Settings!
  • Most assets made during the 48 hours of the GMTK game jam 2022!

Instructions:

  • Orders appear on the top of the screen! Make dishes that sum to those orders!
  • Spawn dice by using the activate key near a ? box.
  • Pick up dice and put them into the pots while the pots are on a burner to cook them. 
  • Combine dice in one pot to sum them up. 
  • Wait for the dice to finish cooking, but don't wait too long or they'll burn!
  • If your pot burns, pick it up and interact with the trash to empty it. 
  • Once a pot is done cooking, click the activate button near it to grab the dish. 
  • Click activate near the serving tables at the top left to try and submit an order. 
  • Complete as many orders as you can!

Have fun!
